name: .WJE File Extension
summary: Learn about .WJE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Digital journal entry created by WinJournal, a journaling and blogging program for Windows; contains a single journal entry, including the date, topic, and entry text; may also include images, audio, and video; used for exporting individual journal entries and importing them into another journal (.WJF file).

content: WinJournal can export WJE files to .RTF, .XML, and .HTML formats, as well as .MP3 Podcast files if audio is included in the entry. They may also be published directly to online blogs.
NOTE: Mariner software no longer develops WinJournal.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
